subject: Re: DataBase Testing
msgSnippet: Hi Steven, How about using HypersonicSQL? It supports both in-process and server-mode. Check it out at http://sourceforge.net/projects/hsql. tom ... -- thomas
messageBody:
Hi Steven,

How about using HypersonicSQL? It supports both in-process and
server-mode. Check it out at http://sourceforge.net/projects/hsql.


tom


Steven Taschuk wrote:
> Does there exist a JDBC driver for a transient in-memory store?
> I'd like to use such a thing as a mock database for testing that
> code makes proper use of JDBC. Testing such things as:
